Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Enemy

  • public abstract class Enemy
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Enemy is a class that moves along a path in order to get to the player’s base. The goal of the enemy is to kill the player’s base if it manages to reach the player’s base. Enemy is able to recalculate its path location when changes are made to the terrain. Enemies must stay on path. They lose health off path.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin Biro

        protected void changeSpeed(int slow,
                           int duration)
        changes the speed of the enemy. The slow does not apply until after a certain amount of time
        Parameters:
        slow - the amount of speed the enemy loses
        duration - the duration of the change of speed
